name: Cheeseburger Tostadas
preparation: For the sauce, in a bowl, combine mayonnaise with sauce mix, ketchup, and relish. Thin with a little warm water so sauce is runny—you should be able to drizzle easily. Set aside.
In a Multipurpose or Round Steamer, combine meat and seasoning. Cover; microwave on high, 3–5 min or until cooked through. Use Ground Meat Separator to break up large chunks. Drain any excess liquid.
To assemble, place tortillas on plates. Spoon meat overtop and sprinkle with tomatoes, coleslaw, and cheese, then drizzle on sauce. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: If you have time, broil both sides of the tortillas on an unlined Sheet Pan to toast before adding toppings.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced fresh veggies of your choice.

products.name: Big Burger Sauce Mix
summary: The tastiest burger sauce on this side of the golden arches. Best of all, it’s free of sodium and preservatives. Simply mix the seasoning with mayo, ketchup, and relish, and you’ve got saucy goodness to slather on burgers, sandwiches, sausages, and hot dogs.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
